name: Baby School Bus For Toddlers
description:
Baby Bus is a fun role playing app for the little one to drive a school bus. Have you ever noticed your little one too eager to go on a bus? Well now, you can put your toddler in the driving seat of a school bus using this Baby Bus App!

We have loaded the app with lots of nursery rhymes for your little one to sing-along whilst driving the bus!

Some of the fun things that your kid will love in the app include:

- Play Children songs in the bus music player
- Tap on different objects in the bus to animate and hear funny sound effects!
- Left and Right Indicator Lights
- Children items on the dashboard let the little mind explore and play.
- And much more!

The universal app is perfect for those with iPad whilst the iPhone version comes in handy whenever you need it.

Give it a try! You won't regret it!

Stay tuned! And please let us know if you have any suggestions for improvement
